item.title: What is UVIX ($UVIX)? And Why It's a Dangerous Investment
item.description: Mew, Kurumi, and Mikael engage in a heated debate about the UVIX ETF, a product that tempts with the allure of ultra-short-term high returns but hides the trap of asset evaporation. They delve into the argument that it can yield massive profits during a market crash versus the critical risk of structural value decay due to contango and leverage decay.
